Literature Text
OMG. I cannot believe it. I was rubbing one out to a video that Cade had sent me. It was a video of him playing with himself, and I just got caught up in the moment. So I came to the bed, watched the video, and made myself orgasm. It was a good one, too. Fuck. But then I turn around, and CADE WAS WATCHING ME THE WHOLE TIME! I had no idea he was even there. I had left the apartment door unlocked, and he had just been coming by to say hey, and fuck! I just want to hide in the sheets and disappear! But he's smiling at me. Thankfully he's not as sadistic as I am. Haha. He makes fun of me a little, but he's smiling. I loosen up. I'm still spent, but I'm recovering quickly, particularly as I look at his eyes and his smile. I say, "So, Cade. You caught me. Whatcha gonna do about that?" He says, "What do you mean?" He's clueless. I say, "You know. You walked in and caught me getting off to that video of you." He's like, "Yeah. Crazy, right?" He's an idiot. A cute idiot, but an
